info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 25 at 1:21AM CDT until July 29 at 6:36PM CDT by NWS Kansas City/Pleasant Hill MO
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...
Blackwater River at Valley City affecting Johnson and Pettis Counties.
Blackwater River near Blue Lick affecting Cooper and Saline Counties.
Crooked River near Richmond affecting Ray County.
Wakenda Creek at Carrollton affecting Carroll County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Blackwater River near Blue Lick.
* WHEN...From early this morning to Tuesday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Cropland and pastures along the river flood. At 29.0 feet, Livestock in pastures along the river may be endangered. Extensive damage also occurs to cropland and pasture.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 27.7 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO TUESDAY EVENING
